page.title: 09Eppleby School In 1984 JS
page.content: When school reopened Mrs. Smith started work as a{clerical assistant.} Mr.O.Hill the{photographer}came. We visited the{Civic Theatre}to see a play called Rainbow Man. Mr. Sunley, {Road Safety Officer,}came to present a certificate for an accident-free year. The school{sports}were held on the village green. The school went on an {outing}to York. Nine children passed the{Cycling Proficiency test.}The {parents evening}was held. The Juniors went to{The Georgian Theatre Royal, } Richmond to see Eric of The Round Table. Then Mr.Lee came to present the Infant Class with a shield for winning the{Road Safety Competition.}The Christmas{Concert}was held on the 18th of December and the school had a {Christmas party.}Then school closed for Christmas.
